actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration, H. Rept. 94-29.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: Resolution to provide for the expenses of the Committee on Education and Labor for the investigations and studies to be conducted pursuant to Rule XI of the Rules of the House of Representatives.

summary.text: Provides up to $1,600,000 from the contingent fund of the House of Representatives for the expenses of the House Committee on Education and Labor for the investigations and studies to be conducted during the first session of the 94th Congress.

titles.title: Resolution to provide for the expenses of the Committee on Education and Labor for the investigations and studies to be conducted pursuant to Rule XI of the Rules of the House of Representatives.
